issue.title: Sound should not appear after ad blocking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%E5%8E%9F%E7%A5%9E&topic_ad=

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Sound should not appear after ad blocking

2. Video (Turn on the volume)
<details><summary>Video 1:</summary>

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8674809/219679089-0793cbb8-666e-438c-a0fd-2f8cc0449d2f.mp4

</details>



### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@Alex-302 

The email has been sent, please check it.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://dragontea.ink/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdragontea.ink%2F) ### Comment > When you first load the link (www.dragontea.ink) It has the website logo then a popup ad loads on the screen and is blocked then it stays on that screen asking you to turn off your ad-blocker. They are probably using a script, it loads a popup to see if it gets blocked and then blocks you from using the website's features if it does. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/srW8iXF.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.53 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Annoyances,
Adblock Warning Removal List

issue.title: dictionary.reverso.net
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://dictionary.reverso.net/spanish-english/secar](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdictionary.reverso.net%2Fspanish-english%2Fsecar) ### Comment > Cuando la extensión está deshabilitada, ingreso la palabra en la casilla y no hace nada en absoluto. Pero cuando deshabilito la extensión y vuelvo a ingresar la palabra en la casilla de este diccionario, sale la definición y por supuesto emerge el anuncio en la parte derecha de la pantalla sin AdGuard. Además sale videos de hasta diez segundos de vez en cuando. Hace un tiempo que ha dejado de funcionar, pero solía funcionar bien antes. No hay ningún resultado al ingresar palabras en la casilla y pulsar la tecla enter sin deshabilitar AdGuard. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/LGKHmka.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/3xKdQQT.png)
